title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 74.2 - Applications for approval
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 74.2 - Applications for approval

State Regulations
(a) Applications for approval of water supply and related sewerage facilities to serve a realty subdivision as conforming with the standards prescribed in this Part shall be made on forms provided by the department. (b) Applications for approval shall be accompanied by such maps, plans, reports, specifications and data as the commissioner may require or direct. Notes

74.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
